meanings.definition: Relating to or characteristic of geophytes.
meanings.sent1: The geophytic flowers bloomed beautifully in the garden.
meanings.sent2: The geophytic plants thrived in the nutrient-rich soil.
meanings.sent3: The geophytic garden seemed to have a secret life underground.
meanings.sent4: Her geophytic nature shone through in her grounded and stable personality.
meanings.sent5: The geophytic characteristics of the plants made them easy to care for.

meanings.definition: A plant that grows from a bulb, corm, or rhizome.
meanings.sent1: The geophytic in our backyard sprouted new leaves after the rain.
meanings.sent2: I planted several geophytics in the flower bed for a pop of color.
meanings.sent3: The geophytic in the pot seemed to wave hello every morning.
meanings.sent4: The geophytic spread its roots deep into the earth, seeking nutrients.
meanings.sent5: Each geophytic in the garden had its own unique charm and beauty.
